name: Secret Words
description: Secret words that are given by the speakers and are filled by the players

name: Login
description: Points are provided when the user performs login for the first time

name: Prepare for the conference
description: Points are given when a user plans for the conference day

name: Share in social media
description: Points are given when a user plans for the conference day

name: Good comment
description: Points are given when a comment submitted by the user is liked by a number of people

name: Puzzle
description: Points are provided a group of people that collect valid collection of codes
